metadata.title: CVE-2018-18439 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.description: DENX U-Boot through 2018.09-rc1 has a remotely exploitable buffer overflow via a malicious TFTP server because TFTP traffic is mishandled. Also, local exploitation can occur via a crafted kernel image.

criterions.comment: u-boot package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2020.04+dfsg-2ubuntu1').
